dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2021 IH: To prohibit the expenditure of Federal funds to Amtrak.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To prohibit the expenditure of Federal funds to Amtrak.

section.header: Prohibition on use of funds for Amtrak
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds shall be made available to Amtrak.
